name: Only One Prison Break
description:
Only One Prison Break

Once upon a time in a world ruled by ONES…

After a nightly power failure in the prison everyone has broken out… except you! You overslept! Even most jailers left the prison. Only you and ONE jailer “Peter Tryhard” are left. Luckily he lost his flashlight and you found it. Now you have to get out of the prison without getting catched by Peter. His eyes are used to the dark, so you can blind him with his flashlight. Take care and don’t use too much power of your flashlight, because you have ONLY ONE battery left! Good Luck!

W,A,S,D -> Movement
E -> Interaction
Mouseposition -> Light direction
Mousewheel -> Increase or lower flashlight range

Programming: Alexander Steinbach, Christoph Schulze

Modeling: Alexander Steinbach, Viktor Steinbach, Christoph Schulze

Music: Yuki Ogura
